name: SKAI LABS
slogan: We help organisations drive strategic value from investments in AI and machine learning
description: We use advanced machine learning and apps development to help you deliver transformative customer experiences.

team.name: Sulabh Sharma
team.bioHtml: Founder @SKAI LABS • Previously Founder Sush (http://sushmobile.com) - 9th Fastest Growing Company in Deloitte NZ Fast 50 and acquired by Finzsoft.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
The Role

Reporting directly to the CEO, the Business Development Manager will drive ambitious sales targets and play a pivotal role in driving the new business. 

By offering Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning based solutions to enterprise clients, you will be working on some of the most challenging and exciting opportunities in the market. 

Main Responsibilities

•	Proactively source and prospect leads and opportunities through various 
        routes to market
•	Network at industry events to gain new leads
•	Strategize and work-up opportunities with new clients
•	Own end-to-end sales process
•	Take a lead in managing client relationships
•	Work closely with the pre-sales and tech teams to build strategic client 
        plans/proposals which align with client needs
•	Keep up to date with industry events, offerings and competitors
•	Drive increased revenue and profit from existing clients 
•	Collaborate with management on strategy and progress
•	Deliver reporting and insights on regular basis

Skills and experience

•	Established sales experience in enterprise sales (5+ years), proven track 
        record of winning and growing large accounts
•	A track record demonstrating excellence in achieving/exceeding sales 
        targets and tendency towards extended customer life time value
•	Highly adaptable, tenacious and self-motivated
•	Experience in digital and tech related sales is a MUST
•	Competitive industry knowledge
•	Ability to develop and lead a sales team
•	Confident, credible and charismatic both on the phone and in person
•	Ability to design and deliver engaging presentations to senior business 
        stakeholders and C levels

Find more about us at https://www.skai.io/

• Ability to develop and lead a sales team
• Confident, credible and charismatic both on the phone and in person
• Ability to design and deliver engaging presentations to senior business
stakeholders and C levels

Find more about us at https://www.skai.io/

jobs.title: Chief Technology Officer
jobs.description:
We are looking for someone who is simulated by intellectually challenging problems and can take full responsibility for the company's technical strategy.

This is a great opportunity for someone who really wants to be part of truly exciting mission-led start-up and is keen to take a deep dive into London’s tech start up ecosystem.

The ideal candidate will possess the following qualities:

• Self-starter and committed
• At least 5 years of experience working in technical teams
• Ability to communicate well to non-technical stakeholders and requirement 
  gathering process
• Capable of building backend API’s and understanding of mobile and front 
  end development
• Enterprise level experience developing in Python and 
  Django REST framework 
• Experience of working with NoSql databases and Graph databases 
• Experience with cloud services such as Amazon and Google 
• Experience of using machine learning libraries such as scikit-learn and 
  developing machine learning strategies
• Experience of Agile/Scrum development
• Management of any junior developers that are subsequently hired 
• An interest in getting your hands dirty with new technologies and challenges
• A mathematical background (Probability and Statistics)


We are looking for someone who can work with us part time or full time right now but we do expect this to become a full-time role within 6 months. The challenges would be un-matched and ongoing and so would be the rewards! 

If this interest you, get in touch asap.

Find more about us at https://www.skai.io/

jobs.title: Machine Learning Expert
jobs.description:
We are looking for someone who is simulated by intellectually challenging problems and can dive in to new areas of research to work on exciting new use cases.

This is a great opportunity for someone who really wants to be part of truly exciting mission-led start-up and is keen to take a deep dive into London’s tech start up ecosystem.

The ideal candidate will possess the following qualities:

• Self-starter and committed
• 2+ publications in top-tier conferences or journals in NLP or ML 
• A Masters/PhD degree in Machine Learning or equivalent 
• Ability to communicate to non-technical stakeholders and contribute to 
  requirement gathering process
• Capable of building backend API’s and understanding of mobile and front 
  end development
• Enterprise level experience developing in Python and 
  Django REST framework 
• Experience of working with NoSql databases and Graph databases 
• Experience with cloud services such as Amazon and Google 
• Experience of using machine learning libraries such as scikit-learn and 
  developing machine learning strategies
• A mathematical background (Probability and Statistics)

The challenges would be un-matched and ongoing and so would be the rewards! 

If this interest you, get in touch asap.

Find more about us at https://www.skai.io/

jobs.title: Marketing Coordinator
jobs.description:
Who are we looking for: Someone who doesn’t go by the rule book when it comes to marketing and brand reputation. Who is obsessed with the idea of building a transformative brand on the foundations of exceptional product quality and super customer experience.

Responsibilities:

•	Contribute to digital strategies and implement them 
•	Create creative and compelling copy across all aspects of our digital and 
        non-digital communications on a daily basis, including website copy, 
        emails, blogs, articles, social media and printed collateral
•	Highly effective in developing a good brand story
•	Create and monitor a clear brand tone of voice and a list of brand 
        guidelines for all communications
•	Coordinate with freelance photographers, videographers and others to 
        create photo and video content for the brand
•	Create great visuals for the website
•	Handle email marketing end-to-end from ideation to creative, content 
        and analytics

What are we looking for:

•	Preferably graduate in Mass Communications, PR or marketing 
•	2+ years experience in marketing
•	Passion, dedication and skills for creating great stories and engaging 
        brand
•	Good knowledge of the camera, storytelling and production – still and 
        video
•	Excellent communication skills – verbal and written
•	Obsessed with growth hacking and related practices 
•	Ability to work independently and flexibly
•	Good understanding of SEO and SEM techniques
•	Strong eye for detail

Find more about us at https://www.skai.io/

jobs.title: Python Data Engineer
jobs.description:
The ideal candidate will possess the following qualities:

- You will be proficient in Python and help us in support our ETL efforts.
- Experience with Spark streaming, Kafka, Hive/Impala, HBase & Yarn
- Experience in building data processing, ETL and data pipelining workflows
- Familiar with big-data technology stack, eg Hadoop, Spark, AWS
- Collaborating with Data Scientists
- Good communication and inter-personal skills

This is a great opportunity for someone who really wants to be part of truly exciting mission-led technology company and is keen to take a deep dive into London’s tech start up ecosystem and at the same work with our enterprise client handling complex data problems.

The challenges would be un-matched and ongoing and so would be the rewards! 

If this interest you, get in touch asap.

Find more about us at https://www.skai.io/
